summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, is a leading consumer electronics company focusing on smartphones, smart hardware, and IoT platforms. With a mission to create affordable, innovative products globally, Xiaomi emphasizes technology, cost-effectiveness, and product coolness. Their future strategies include re-entrepreneurship, internet manufacturing, and steady progress. Xiaomi aims to lead in smart living, influence future lifestyles, and empower Chinese manufacturing. Positioned for growth, Xiaomi envisions a decade of engineering excellence and global impact, shaping a brighter future for all.
